title: Reporter’s Notebook: Israeli hostage families plead, peace falters, and war grinds on in Gaza
summary: Israel launches ground invasion of Gaza City targeting remaining Hamas terrorists while hostage families and civilians endure ongoing humanitarian crisis.

title: BROADCAST BIAS: Networks can’t handle truth behind Charlie Kirk’s assassination
summary: Broadcast networks criticized for biased reporting on Charlie Kirk assassination case, with alleged shooter Tyler Robinson's political leanings becoming contentious issue.

title: Senior Republican says he'll 'miss the clowns,' not 'the circus' as he eyes life after Congress
summary: Rep. Michael McCaul is leaving Congress at the end of next year and is looking back at his time served and what lies ahead.

title: JOSH HAMMER: Trial lawyer lawfare vs. Trump's policy revolution
summary: Democrat trial lawyers deploy legal challenges against Trump's executive orders on alternative investments, energy exploration, and government efficiency reforms.

title: Kamala Harris reveals what Biden told her just before crucial debate with Trump that left her 'angry'
summary: Kamala Harris reveals in her new book that Biden called just before her debate with Trump to wish her luck — and to give her a warning about major donors.
